```css
// Property: grouping
// Description: A constant that specifies the ordering of the result array.
// Component(s): MediaQueryType
'.grouping-music-media-group-title': { grouping: Ti.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_GROUP_TITLE }
'.grouping-music-media-group-album': { grouping: Ti.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_GROUP_ALBUM }
'.grouping-music-media-group-artist': { grouping: Ti.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_GROUP_ARTIST }
'.grouping-music-media-group-album-artist': { grouping: Ti.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_GROUP_ALBUM_ARTIST }
'.grouping-music-media-group-composer': { grouping: Ti.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_GROUP_COMPOSER }
'.grouping-music-media-group-genre': { grouping: Ti.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_GROUP_GENRE }
'.grouping-music-media-group-playlist': { grouping: Ti.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_GROUP_PLAYLIST }
'.grouping-music-media-group-podcast-title': { grouping: Ti.Media.MUSIC_MEDIA_GROUP_PODCAST_TITLE }
```
